DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics sunitinib plus FOLFIRI ( irinotecan , 5-FU l-leucovorin ) first-line treatment Japanese mCRC patient
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Sunitinib With FOLFIRI In Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patient histologically cytologicallyconfirmed colorectal adenocarcinoma unresectable metastatic disease document diagnostic imaging study . Patient must least one RECISTdefined measurable lesion treat prior local therapy . History another primary malignancy within 3 year prior study entry , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer situ carcinoma uterine cervix . Current , recent , planned participation experimental treatment drug study protocol .
